verbs.description: [ARG1: U.S. stocks] [V: bounced] [ARG2: between gains and losses] [ARGM-TMP: as plummeting oil prices rocked energy shares and investors weighed what U.S. President Donald Trump called North Korea ’s “ warm and productive ” response to his decision to cancel a summit with the nation ’s leader Kim Jong - Un . The dollar rose with Treasuries , while gold sank] .

U.S. stocks bounced between gains and losses as [V: plummeting] [ARG1: oil prices] rocked energy shares and investors weighed what U.S. President Donald Trump called North Korea ’s “ warm and productive ” response to his decision to cancel a summit with the nation ’s leader Kim Jong - Un . The dollar rose with Treasuries , while gold sank .

The dollar rose with Treasuries , while gold sank .
